3472.verse: هُدًى|A guidance|93|178|33$وَرَحْمَةً|and a mercy|102|272|4357$لِّلْمُحْسِنِينَ|for the good-doers,|150|235|13787$

3475.verse: وَمِنَ|And of|64|72|74$ٱلنَّاسِ|the mankind|100|116|75$مَن|(is he) who|95|111|76$يَشْتَرِى|purchases,|92|108|13788$لَهْوَ ٱلْحَدِيثِ|idle tales|136|152|13789$لِيُضِلَّ|to mislead|87|103|6128$عَن|from|54|62|1105$سَبِيلِ|(the) path|89|98|1358$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|100|2$بِغَيْرِ|without|70|88|612$عِلْمٍ|knowledge,|94|112|4620$وَيَتَّخِذَهَا|and takes it|99|118|13790$هُزُوًا‌ۚ|(in) ridicule.|99|118|659$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those|82|91|51$لَهُمْ|for them|76|171|98$عَذَابٌ|(is) a punishment|135|325|72$مُّهِينٌ|humiliating.|94|189|872$

3476.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|94|96$تُتْلَىٰ|are recited|92|110|3123$عَلَيْهِ|to him|64|82|395$ءَايَـٰتُنَا|Our Verses,|97|115|7237$وَلَّىٰ|he turns away|115|133|13111$مُسْتَكْبِرًا|arrogantly|105|123|13791$كَأَن|as if|57|66|4179$لَّمْ|not|42|50|63$يَسْمَعْهَا|he (had) heard them,|162|177|13792$كَأَنَّ|as if|57|72|13793$فِىٓ|in|48|63|89$أُذُنَيْهِ|his ears|71|86|13794$وَقْرًا‌ۖ|(is) deafness.|111|126|5503$فَبَشِّرْهُ|So give him tidings|144|152|13795$بِعَذَابٍ|of a punishment|126|372|2717$أَلِيمٍ|painful.|68|314|2718$

3477.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|76|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|102|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|94|84$وَعَمِلُواْ|and do|92|104|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|righteous deeds,|130|142|239$لَهُمْ|for them|76|88|98$جَنَّـٰتُ|(are) Gardens|111|117|9435$ٱلنَّعِيمِ|(of) Delight,|100|100|5123$

3478.verse: خَـٰلِدِينَ|(To) abide forever|141|148|1409$فِيهَا‌ۖ|in it.|54|69|253$وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ|(The) Promise of Allah|166|181|8195$حَقًّا‌ۚ|(is) true.|79|94|1566$وَهُوَ|And He|67|82|305$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|(is) the All-Mighty,|145|152|1187$ٱلْحَكِيمُ|the All-Wise.|105|105|343$

3479.verse: خَلَقَ|He created|93|104|299$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|136|351$بِغَيْرِ|without|70|91|612$عَمَدٍ|pillars|61|82|9313$تَرَوْنَهَا‌ۖ|that you see|105|126|9314$وَأَلْقَىٰ|and has cast|106|127|6856$فِى|in|48|59|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|99|100$رَوَٲسِىَ|firm mountains|116|129|9319$أَن|lest|44|57|655$تَمِيدَ|it (might) shake|125|138|9914$بِكُمْ|with you,|82|95|2564$وَبَثَّ|and He dispersed|133|146|1427$فِيهَا|in it|54|61|253$مِن|from|50|67|53$كُلِّ|every|57|90|185$دَآبَّةٍ‌ۚ|creature.|81|114|1429$وَأَنزَلْنَا|And We sent down|145|178|536$مِنَ|from|50|83|156$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|the sky|84|117|157$مَآءً|water|58|75|202$فَأَنۢبَتْنَا|then We caused to grow|184|202|13256$فِيهَا|therein|66|102|253$مِن|of|50|86|53$كُلِّ|every|57|93|185$زَوْجٍ|kind|68|104|3841$كَرِيمٍ|noble.|68|86|12877$

3471.verse: These are verses of the wise Book,

3472.verse: As guidance and mercy for the doers of good

3473.verse: Who establish prayer and give zakah, and they, of the Hereafter, are certain [in faith].

3474.verse: Those are on [right] guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful.

3475.verse: And of the people is he who buys the amusement of speech to mislead [others] from the way of Allah without knowledge and who takes it in ridicule. Those will have a humiliating punishment.

3476.verse: And when our verses are recited to him, he turns away arrogantly as if he had not heard them, as if there was in his ears deafness. So give him tidings of a painful punishment.

3477.verse: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them are the Gardens of Pleasure.

3478.verse: Wherein they abide eternally; [it is] the promise of Allah [which is] truth. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

3479.verse: He created the heavens without pillars that you see and has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with you, and dispersed therein from every creature. And We sent down rain from the sky and made grow therein [plants] of every noble kind.

3480.verse: This is the creation of Allah. So show Me what those other than Him have created. Rather, the wrongdoers are in clear error.
